content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were driving in a vw bus about 11 pm one summer night across the drawbridge from pensacola beach to gulf breeze, fl. i glance out the window and see some strange craft sitting up in the air over the marina.  we pulled over to the side of the road as soon as we crossed the bridge. i have never seen anything like it before or since. it was about two to three hundred feet up in the sky and sitting there not making a sound. it was a 6 sided figure with the lines that were parallel with the horizon about 3 or 4 times longer than the other 4. it was approximately 50' wide and 15' feet high. if you can imagine that. it was divided through the middle with a line parallel with the other two longer sides. it had rows of panels along the top and bottom halves. these alternated in color from red to green to blue to yellow in such a way as to give it the appearance of the panels moving around the craft. we watched for a few minutes and then the next thing i know is that we were heading down the road and i was looking up in the sky and it was still there. we rode home without speaking and i don't remember talking about it for years. not even the next morning, it was like we had put it out of our heads. and when i would try to bring it up my buddy would say "i don't wanna talk about it". this has gone on now for 40 years and i still wonder about that night. 
   i  lived next to airbases as a child and i have never seen anything like this. pensacola naval air station is nearby. it was nothing from there i am sure.
content.summary: About 50' wide and 15' tall. had multicolored panels in 2 rows that seemed to move

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We my husband and i were at laughlin, nv. there was no one else around. we were right on the boardwalk near the river palms hote. it came over us very slowly with out any any any sound at all. it was huge. the were in a v shape almost like a flock of geese but much much bigger. the entire area was so huge if you can imagine how big 16 vw bugs in the sky in a v formation  but and yet independent. we froze and stared as if we take our eyes off we may miss something. then they gradually disappeared into the coulds. no one else was around, someone is almost always around however it was midweek but still that was somewhat rare. i called the air traffic control and they did not see anything, no reports. just recently i hear that the air traffic control at laughlin closes at 6pm that was something that has bothered me for 7 and a half years that there is no way they could not see that thing. but it was about 6:30 so there was no one there to see it. they were all together however they seemed to be very independent i say that because one side seemed to move a little different almost like a push off of a wing kind of like. each one was not lite but seem to illuminate the lights shinning into the sky from the bug hotel. they almost looked opal not a light not a color but like it was reflecting light. we have gone back to the exact same spot and same time of year same time of day it just to this day boggles my mind. all i can say is what ever it was was really big and i have no ideal what it was. i would like to think they were deaf geese of extreme in size unable to honk and each a white opal in color what in the world was it i don't know i am just glad my husband saw it too! he tells no one in fear they will believe him crazy i did at first tell others but not really any more because it is unbeleivable. i have notified many on the internet however i have tried and tried to locate someone who has seen something like it the closest i have come up with is those balloons in mexico except the ones we saw were in a formation all together. that's it wish i had had a cell phone with a camera back then only a cell phone and no camera.It had us spellbound.
content.summary: Total of about 8 oval to round balloon shapes on ea side for a total of 16 ea the size of about a sm vw bug

content.detailedDescription:
Actually, this one event turned into many events that still happen to this day. it started out as a quiet drive back to our house on a country road miles from our house. me and my wife were coming back from an outing and decided to take the back way to our home, which is in an area that is still mostly rural and dotted with corn and wheat fields, although development was only about ten miles behind us. at this point we were due east of celina. 

needless to say, it is pitch black out there, and the only lights visible is from farm and ranch homes. the roads are long and winding. anyway we were driving along talking, and we were about to reach a curve in the road where an old cemetary and church is, when we both saw this object in the night sky that was turning all different colors. we pulled down by the cemetary on a whiterock road to get a better look at it to see what it was. i wanted to see if the object was stationary as we had observed it from the road while we were driving. as i stopped the car, lights still on, me and my wife observed that the object was truly stationary, and hovering about two or three hundred feet off the ground. now there were many trees in front of us, no bare ground, but i made an educated guess at its elevation from the ground.

i decide to get out of the car to get a better look at this thing to determine if it was a helcopter, plane moving slow, a passenger jet heading for dfw airport. it was none of these things as far as i could tell. i ask my wife what she saw, and she said that she saw a stationary object turning different colors and it looked to her as if it were spinning around as it was changing colors. i told her that i agreed and we continued to watch this object until i got an idea. now, you must understand that i am not a scary person, just the opposite, and i wanted to see if i could get a reaction out of this thing to see if it would come our way, or at least acknowledge that it saw us, so despite my wife's protests, i stood in front of our car lights and waved my hands and jumped up and down to get its attention.

in that kind of darkness, anyone could have seen me doing what i was doing in a plane flying much higher. i was counting on that.  well, at first nothing, but then this object went completely dark, like nothing was there, then its lights gradually came back on. i told my wife, i think i got a reaction. well, i started jumping up and down again waving my hands, and this time the object began coming our way. my wife wanted to leave, but i said let's see what this thing really is.

we did not have long to wait, because it was almost over us in a mater of about 30 seconds, but veered to our right as it got near. it had dropped altitude to about 100feet, and was slowly moving by us at about 150 yards away. the first thing we noticed was that there was no sound coming from this thing, we were listening real hard, nothing but dead quite. 

i told my wife that i saw an object that was triangular with three white lights at its rear, she said she saw the same thing, and that it looked like a triangular wedge shape. the different colored lights that it had been displaying were no longer being displayed. it was black in color all over. i began to follow it on foot down the whiterock road to the right of where we were parked. it began to move off from us as i motioned to it to come back our way. i wanted it to land.

it continued away from us at a steady speed going southwest, finally disappearing into the night.

now i want to say that this object has been a regular visitor about a quarter of a mile away, about 200 feet up, and west of our house for two years now. it appears with its spinning multi-color lights on many nights. i have flashed my flashlight directly at it to get a response from it, and most times it will begin to spin faster and flash more colors. sometimes though it will almost stop emitting light altogether, and begin moving off to the north and west. it does not show up all the time, there are periods when i do not see it at all.

but i want to say that i have watched it trying to maintain its hovering position making movements to the left or right to keep its center of gravity. much like a person trying to keep their balance on a round ball, little corections that keeps it stable.

i have even turned my back patio light on so that it can see me, and i make gestures that tell it that i can see it.

i do not know what this is, i have speculated that it could be a military platform that our government is trying out over populated areas. however, i do not think that we are even capable of this type of technology, and my instincts tell me these could be some type of probes from another craft monitoring this area. you see, me and my wife have speculated that the reason that this thing or things are around here is because of all the air traffic that comes and goes north and south. it is a perfect place to observe without being noticed to much.

one more thing, one night a month ago, i was outside at about midnight and observed a dimly lit round object flying from west to east at about 1000 feet at a high rate of speed, no sound.

all i can say about these things is that, why has someone else not seen this, and how could they not. with no pictures, video, or anything, it is just my word, and personal account.

end of event.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spotted in sky on country road while driving

content.detailedDescription: In june 1972 i met jack bing at a market in june lake calif.  he asked me and leah to visithim at his house and he wanted to show us some things. we went a few hours later and he went on to explain many ufo sightings and showed us many new forms of music that we had never heard before.He even later that eveningclaimed to show us a light in the sky that he said was a spaceship. we went back to out cabin and were a littleunnerved by the whole storybut not unbelieving. a few years later we ended up moving there.And there was what we called a spaceship school there. it was ran by two women hope and grace and they claimed to have communications with the brothers of light that inhabited these spaceships.There were a good number of students who attended that were our age and we visited a couple of their sunday services. the story went that the main angel was gabriel and jesus himself had been at one time taken away in one of these spacecrafts. all of this would have been hard to take except for the fact that sightings of crafts were happening continually at this time and both of us with other witnesses had seen craft on more that one occasion.Still i felt uneasy about this and went to the bible and god for some help. i found three scriptures that seemed to disagree with the philosphy being taught and went to the school to ask a few questions. hope told me she loved questions from her students and we sat down for a chat i asked her the first scripture and she answered ,"well what jesus meant by that was,.." with a little chuckle in her voice and i said well if that's true what about this scripture and  she answered alittle more intensely "well what jesus really meant was!!!" andi said well if that is true then what about this scripture? hope was in her late 60-70's at the time and jumped straight in the air twirled and flew out of the room!! i was left sitting at the table with mouth opened and a litle man grabed me by the arm and said hope has a headache and i was put out the door of the trailor and left looking at the beautiful high sierras wondering if that really just happened!!The next morning i was up early and on the way to mammoth and sunsshining and the sky was blue and as clear as can be and a spacecraft came up over the pine trees in full sight and i looked at it and pointed my finger at it and said these words "satan you're a liar! and in the name of jesus be gone" the craft shook in the air and disappeared and i've never seen one since that day. i believe that this entire ufo lore is just the demons trying as hard as they can to do the job they do so well,deceive. it says that satan is the prince of the air and would do many miracles in the last days to fool many even the elect if that was possible.Not many have had the experience that i had or have been lead to the complete conclusion because with so many seeing is believing but the magician knows if he can distract the veiwer the trickand illusion will be a great success.I'm telling this story knowing that manywill think i'm lying or fabricating this for a personal religious view but i promise you that nothing could be further from the truth. at the time i was not a christian but these events plus others have helped me to find that way of living.I witnessed these things and tell you that i stand by this statement. michael corry sept 17th 2008
content.summary: Spaceship with lights appeared over the sierra in june lake calif.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 12 years old in 1976 my family had just moved to a new house in chesterfield sc. i was moving boxes from a van parked 150' away from our new house back and forth on a straight path and noticed a small 4'-5' diameter solid metallic disc shaped object hovering overhead at about 200ft. it was silver polished aluminum in color with a dark band about 6" wide around the perimeter. i would guesstimate its thickness to be about 1 foot in the middle and tapering to about 6 inches at the perimeter. there were 6 pie segment lines thru the diameter of the craft. there were no other markings, insignia, id numerals, exhaust ports, antennae, landing gear, access hatches, camera ports or any visible means of propulsion. no sound was emitted. there were no flashing lights or exhaust of any kind. this was not a tethered mylar balloon or a drone of any kind(that was military or civilian in nature). i was 12 years old at the time and could identify almost any aircraft,missile or drone/rpv(very few were in service at that time). i've been an aerospace enthusiast all my life and i know pretty much any aircraft or flight vehicle that takes to the skies and i could not identify it. it was about 10oclock in the morning est and a clear blue sky with about 2-5mph cross wind to my position. the craft maintained a back and forth track perpindicular to the wind so i ruled a ballon out. and yes i'm familiar with what weather balloons of all sizes and shapes look like and this was not following the wind patterns or acting like a tethered balloon!  everytime i would move it would move to maintain position directly overhead. if i moved faster it would keep up and if i moved slower it would slow down or stop when i did. it was always directly overhead. this continued for 30 minutes. when i remembered where my camera finally was and retreived it the craft had disappeared from my line of sight. my position was atop a small hill. i had about a 2 mile line of sight in all directions and could not see it. i was only out of sight with it for about 30 seconds. as a kid no one would have believed me and thought i was crazy so i never told anyone until my adult years. i don't think i've ever questioned our belief that we're the only sentient beings in the galaxy more than after that day. i've heard reports of smaller ufo's but this lead me to believe that humans are not the only ones who might send a small recon vehicle instead of a larger craft. this was way too small to have carried any substantial sized beings in it so i assumed it was a remote or autonomous vehicle. i was unnerved at first, but i felt i was in no immediate danger. after it seemed to mimic my every move it was kind of a game for a while. i seriously thought someone might be trying to play a joke on me and looked to a nearby treeline for a tether but saw nothing. i have made homemade hot air balloons and flown helium filled balloons before and this craft did not behave as a balloon would. i really had to convince myself that this was some type of craft i had no knowledge of, given the flight profile. i'm still baffled to this day as to what that object was. thanks for running this site. i realize that there's a lot of misidentification of aircraft and natural phenomina and it's easy to mistake a man-made or natural objects for a ufo. sorry, this was a perfectly clear day and my eyesight was better than perfect at that age. i've lived around military bases for a number of years and seen all types of military and civilian aircraft plus a few bomarc missile launches and there was no mistaking that this object was extremely out of place! 
     i also worked for an ex-captain in the u.S. navy and after i told him what i saw he told me his story too. long story short=2 destroyer patrol sweep in the caribean during the cuban missile crisis. he was called up on deck around midnight to witness an extremely large, bright object traveling underneath the water directly in between the 2 destroyers(2 miles apart) at a high rate of speed. as it passed between them it erupted from the water at a shallow angle. there were about 100 men on deck on both ships who witnessed the huge, bright object angle from the water and flick out of sight in about 3 seconds into space. when his men asked if it was russian he replied "it's not russian and it's not ours". he dutifully filed a report and was asked not to pursue it by his commanders-understandibly. and he's an ivy league graduate with 2 degrees and served in the pentagon. he told me "you're not crazy, i'm not crazy and i don't believe in church anymore!" 
again, thanks for having the conviction to run an orginization that is investigating the possibility that there are more intelligent beings than ourselves. because the alternative is downright scary(and pathetic!) if we're the most advanced species in the universe...Now that's laughable.
content.summary: 4'-5' disc shaped metallic craft hovered overhead for 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: it was late at night probably 11.00 pm or later and probably on a july evening but it has been many years ago. (1978 or, 1979). i had the summers off for a few weeks every early july (model change from gm) and that is the only reason i can associate the time with july. sorry. i was with a freind in the pool by ourselves and i was reaching up from under the dive board hanging on as we just floated enjoying the warm night air. i noticed a helocopter comming down the beach (daytona)at a slow rate of speed with a huge spotlight pointing down at the beach. it was the bright kind like you would see at an event where they shine spot lights into the air to attract people from many miles away. the light was not quite that large though, only as bright. i remember thinking that they were probably looking for people parked on the beach but that was not illegle. i also thought that maybe they were looking for couples laying on the beach making love or something. it was not like the police to make a big deal of that though would it? i wondered to myself. as the craft came closer i could only guess the distance with a certain amont of accuracy untill it got so close that the angle in relation to the ocean edge made it easy to judge. once it got approximately 80 to 90 yards it stopped for 5 -10 seconds. i cant remember what had been discussed between my freind and i to this point in time in the incident. at that point (about 5 to 10 seconds) the craft made a flare of light similar to a fireworks explosion except that eventhough the light went in all directions, it didnt go as far as a big fireworks display. maybe similar to seeing a firewoorks go off from a mile or two away. small but we know it was right in front of us. close. (80 to 90 yards) as i mentioned before , the angle was greater to the beach edge and as it got closer you cold tell that it was almost between us and the beach edge (tide). the pool we were in was about 100 or 125 yards from the water so as it got closer, you could judge easily. (especially with the spot light right there) at any rate, now as it made this fireworks -like lightfor maybe one second it vanished and stoped out over the sea about 4 or 5 miles out and hovered. (no sound) now it was just a big light but you could tell that it was now out over the sea about 4  or 5 or 6 miles but it took less than 1 second to get there from the beach with no sound ! i couldnt tell you if my freind and i looked at each other at this point and said wow ! or what! but it had hoverd about 3 or 4 seconds and did that little fireworks type light thing again and disapeared. i can distinctly remember that as i looked at my freind  the first thing i thought was that 'who would beleive this' and before i could finish asking what do we do? who do we talk to , my freind said  "who would believe us anyway" and this i remember because it is the same thing that i was thinking as she said it to me! it is that reason and that reason only that i can so distinctly remember this conversation. i could probably draw an example of the sighting but it is hard to explain in text. i had not spoken to anyone about this for many years and the freind and i had not discussed this matter to anyone that i know of between then and the time we had gone our seperate ways as freinds. at one point i had asked my father (passed on) about his feeling because he was a very logical and technical type person who had an answer for everything. i thought he would be the one to ask. he explained in our breif discussion that they now have experimental helocopters with jet engines on them that make them fast and agile. that was as good as his explanation got. this is a good one i thought as he never gets stumped. i was apprehensive in the first place to talk about this stuff and didnt want to argue that i couldnt hear this thing make any noise from less than 100 yards. he may have considered my remark a provocation for an argument. he was an ornery old coot. the subject was dropped at that point partly to avoid further embarassment on my part. john p.S> see attachments /  drawings.
content.summary: No good look at the craft itself but only of the light from it.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in outside of mancos co.,population of ~ 800 people.  i enjoy resting in my hot tub and viewing the night sky.  viewing the sky, i noticed -- what appeared to be a star, but moved slowly, in spurts, and somewhat in a pulsating manner westwardly.  movement was slow and irratic.  depending upon the angle that i saw the object; it appeared to have lights moving horizontally across in a sweeping fashion.  it also appeared as if there was a "main" light, but also smaller sweeping lights moving in either direction, and what appears to have no order.  difficult to determine if the object at times moved closer to the ground or was moving laterally, or combinations thereof.  seamed harmless, and difficult to determine size and distance.  two planes (i think normal flights) flew somewhat near the object ... and the object then stayed stationary and looked like an ordinary star.  shortly after each plan passed then the object would move slightly and the horizonatal lights would appear.  the horizonatal lights were predominately white in color, but on occasion ( i think i saw some green and red hues).  

my neighbor, harry kinder has mentioned he has seen several unidentified objects in the sky previously.  i too, have seen these star-like objects previously, but to be honest, i thought my imagination or eye sight may have been playing tricks upon me.  

getting back to this object, i was in the hot tub for at least an hour .. just gazing at this object, and to try to figure out if a pattern was in involved with the lighting. 

no photos, difficult to determine how high or size of object. appears to have moved around in the sky, then stopped, as if to look as if it were a star. 

my feelings were at best neutral.  it was just there, no excitement thrill or anything.  i was more curious than anything.  it presented no harm or sudden movement.
content.summary: Star-like object moved sporatically / pulsing / stationary.  at angles lights moved along an axis to center light

content.detailedDescription: I went outside for my morning break, about nine o'clock. casually, i looked north and spotted a shiny, silver object at a distance. at first i thought it was a plane, except there was no noise, and it didn't move. i couldn't judge how far or high it was. i only noticed that it reflected sun and was shaped like an egg cut in half with the flat part parallel to the ground. when i moved to get a better look, i looked down. i looked up and the object was gone. i scanned the sky, believing i had confused the object for a plane heading to or from dia. i thought that i would spot it either east or west. there were no clouds in the sky, but i was unable to locate what i saw. i have debated reporting this since the event, doubting what i saw and trying to convince myself it was only my imagination.
content.summary: Unknown unmoving object

content.detailedDescription: I was at willow park practicing basketball when i looked up when i shot a shot. i thought it was like a special bird. so i kept on looking and  i saw that it wasn't flying but streaking throught the air like an airplane. i saw a small flash for a second. so i wondered what it was. i lost sight of the object when it when behind a large tree. i tried to find it again but it was hopeless. i told everybody what i saw, but nobody believed me.
content.summary: The ufo was shaped like a boomerang in a disc form. it took about 30 seconds to become out of sight. it was a grayish color. it was kinda bright.

content.detailedDescription: I ama over the road truck driver with my husband and i drive nights,and this day not to be exact,i was driving on and about 02:30 central time i seen something moving on the uper part of my wind shield when i looked up there was this grayish hugh metal object fling just above the streetlightscould not hear any noice but it was moving really slow it had one light yello flashing the bottom of the object waswell like you see on tv i was stund i was trying to find a place to pull over but thought what no way did i just see that i never belived in ufo'sso i got on the cb radio and asked if the fewtruck drivers that were out seen anything no answer then i saw a lot of lights flying like in a formation as the way birds fly they we white small bright lights .Then a few months later i was drving i-74il and seen areally big glowing green light really big capsule like fling not straight down but in a angal that night someone else driving a duley truck saw it also when i asked on the cb he answered.I reported the 1st siting to a jasonleigh.Org?Greywolf1.Htmhe was found when i was trying to find out where to report this he at www.Uforeportingcentering.Com and also reported it to peter davenport  director:nuforc    back to the 1stt siting: when i first saw it i thought it was a plane but no way it was flying to low and stright it was moving very slow i thought i was seeing things but i know what i saw for sure why have i seen 3 things is this normal do people really see these more then once.I belive now but not in aliens it has to be something but what.Then cant remember exactly but i was in dallas,tx watching the news and there it was the same thing i saw other people sawit was right on the news same night i saw it
content.summary: Metal object sawonly the bottom/10 sec later lights were seen

content.detailedDescription:
My best friend and i were very interested in astronomy. one moonless night we were lying in the grass of his back yard watching stars.  we noticed two lights traveling side by side at high altitude east to west and assumed they were jets from andrews afb. suddenly the "lights" began to circle each other in a complex pattern that no aircraft could perform; it was as if they were orbiting each other at high speed while having stopped their forward motion.
the suddenly both objects broke contact and one went north and the other south at an incredible speed, too fast to follow. we were both so astounded by what we had seen that we ran into the house where my friend called the telephone operator. she told us that we were probably just imagining things and to tell our parents. (they were out for the evening)

i have thought about this for years. looking back it seems like a thing search lights could do, however; the lights were very high and bright like planes or stars and search lights would have shown beams.  lasers might have done it, but i don't believe they had them at that time or at least not to play with.  no, these lights were flying like airplanes until they stopped and did the weird orbit thing and then vanished at high speed. certainly this could be replicated today with special effects, but we are speaking of the 1950s.

of course the washington area was a hot bed of ufo activity in the late 40s and early 50s. i was born in 47 as was my friend, but we had been told stories by some older kids about jets flying low level down the potomac river
on many nights during that time. (i suppose to get beneath the radar) at any rate the ufo situation was something everyone seemed to take as a fact of life in the dc and northern va area back then.  all i can say is what i am describing really happened and i have no solid explanation for it.  perhaps someone else has had a similar experience.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw two lights travel parallel then circle each other and take off at right angles at high speed.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend eric johnson was deer hunting on my land in wilcox county when we say a round like object in the air it came down then went up fast so we waited a second then it came back down and paused for like 4-5 minutes we got a good look at it to make sure it was a ufo and it was so we ran inside to get my mom came back outside and it was gone and till this day no one takes me serious about what we saw. when we saw it we were like shocked and scared at the same time
content.summary: Circle like object with lights all around it

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of september 16, 2008, several people witnessed and recorded three "barrel" shap objects over bogota, colombia (a very large city in the andes).  i saw this report on rcn's english language broadcast:  www.Rcnnews.Tv  to view, you will need to check the archives.  word about this might also be found in colombian newspapers.

colombia seems to experience heavy ufo activity and there is speculation that a landing-strip is being prepared in a rural area.
content.summary: Sightings of three "barrels" in the bogota sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the 8th grade.  i went fishing with mr. franke who lived about 7 miles south of ogalalla, neb.  we went to lake mccounaghey a few miles north of ogalalla.  it was late at night and we had a coleman lantern lit to be able to see our bobbers.
i saw a small white light to our left.  it kept getting larger and larger and when i asked mr. franke "what is that?", he replied "i don't know but it isn't bothering us." it kept getting larger and larger and brighter and brighter till the bay we were fishing in was completely lit as if it was daylight.  mr. franke turned off the coleman lantern and we fished without the lantern for quite a while.  at this time i would say the bright light was about as big as a house.  suddenly it took off and went at right angles from its approach going straight away from us and was gone in about 10 seconds.  we had a terrible time re-lighting the lantern.
i had and have no idea what it was.  it was only a light but it became as big as a house and lit up the area we were in like daylight.  i could see nothing except a huge bright light.  once it got to a position about the end of the bay it sat there for 30-40 minutes and got no brighter nor closer than that.  as i was in the eighth grade i was scared at first until mr. franke made his comment.  then he said "we might as well turn this light off".  it was as bright as daylight.  we caught no fish until it zoomed off at which time the fish started biting although we had a terrible time re-lighting the lantern.  it was gone in 10 seconds just a streak across the sky.  i had no camera so there is no real proof.
i grew up and became an engineer, worked at cape canaveral during the 1960s and have never seen anything like it since nor understood what it was.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light approached taking 45 minutes - left at right angle gone in 10 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
We were waiting for the bus to go to our grandfathers at the 1500 block of park ave. in balt. md. i look up at the stars. i saw one making squares .I said "look bud what is that? it dident make a sound just made squares all over the evening sky.Then shot away. we never told any one.
also about three years ago i saw an alien  in my back yard. it was summer iiwas in bed about midnight looked out the open window by my bed. something was moving,i put on my glasses to see what it was. it was a very small person about 4 feet tall. he was creeping across the yard i knew he didn't want to be seen.My yard is very bright there. he was wearing some kind of suit one peace with hood as i saw no ears. i was fasanated. he creeped so slowly looking all around.He sure didn't want to be seen. i thought he was cute. i realy wanted to speak to him but thought better of it. he was not human. i searched the web to see if i could find one who looked like him. and i did but its not much help as he looked like the one in the alien autopsuy sure wish i could see him again. i layed back down when i looked again he was gone.This took place at my home in kanab ut. in 2005
content.summary: My brother and i were sitting at the bus stop and guess what happened

content.detailedDescription: Ok, this all happened when i was a little kid back in india. i had noone to tell bout all of this because ofcourse...Who the heck would believe me?. ive seen this website on my msn page today so i guess i can finally talk bout wat i saw when i was young. back in india where im from, i saw 2 orbs of light hovering up and down across my house on top of the building opposite mine. now these orbs couldve been anything right? guys with flashlights w.E but the thing is...After a short while they just rose into the air and flew off!!!. since i was a little kid at that time i didnt really care but thinking bout it right now after watching all those ufo videos like jamie maussan and others im just kinda shocked that i might have seen 2 ufos when i was a kid. also i have 1 more story to share with you guys. when i was on vacation to chennai during the summer time, i was travelling in the train that goes there. i always used to go there every summer so yea, it was this specific trip that startled me. when i looked out of the window from the moving train, i saw a saucer like object that was pure grey flying really low just a little far away from the train. im totally sure it wasnt an aircraft coz there is noooo frickin way an aircraft would fly that low and there were absolutely no airports around that area as well coz we were like really far away from chennai so the idea of an aircraft flying low to land would be out of the question. this object was no jet since jets werent round and they too dont fly that low. i dont think any of this would be of any use to u guys anymore since it happened a long ass time ago but yea i just wanted to share it with some people who actually do believe that we have visitors on this planet. thank you.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: 2 balls of light hovering up and down on top of the building opposite my house

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were walking west in the sam's club parking lot toward the building. my wife and i both saw the object at about the same time. it didn't look like a plane or move fast enough to seem like a plane. i thought it may have been a helicopter tracking i-49 south.  my wife (she was pretty excited at this point) has better eyes than me and said it looked like a floating rubber duck. (i really couldn't see a definite shape until i reviewed my pictures.)  the object had a somewhat oval shape with 'fins', and a rectangular 'flag' or 'sail' above it. it moved at a moderate, constant speed from north to south.  i decided to take a movie of it. i had my camera (canon a510) in hand and started to take a little movie of it.  as soon as i hit the shutter button i realized that the quality wouldn't be very good.  you can hear me in the video saying, "uhh, this ain't gettin' it."  so, i took a quick photo, zoomed in and took a second photo. then we lost sight of it behind the building.  we continued with our shopping.  we thought afterwards that maybe we should have gotten back into the van and followed it, but by then it was too late.
content.summary: Seen at 4:42pm travelling south at a constant speed.  at best guess, it may have been about a mile west of my vantage point.  lost sight of it behind a building.

content.detailedDescription:
I had knocked on the back door of a friends house and was waiting for him to answer. i looked to the sky and saw 6 round lights in a triangle formation. the lights traveled at a very high speed. i began banging on my friends again trying to get him come out to so this. suddenly the leading light became very bright and disappeared. this occured with the next two lights and then the last three. my friend came out just in time to see the last three lights become brighter and then go out. the air national guard, stationed at youngstown airport, said the were weather balloons. i, at twelve years old, thought that the weather balloon explanation very weak and figured they really didnt know.

i personally believe our planet is just another grain of sand in the universe and is just not possible that our planet is the only one supporting life in some form. just like "battle star gallatica," there could very well be others  having to leave ther dying planet and find a new home. this will happen to us some day. that is if we don't kill ourselves off first.
content.summary: 6 round lights in a triangle

content.detailedDescription: I saw what appeared to be a full moon near the mountain.I watched it slowly rise up go over the mountain then slowly descend.This all happen in ten minutes. i was watching my clock.It was five minutes to two when i noticed it moving and five minutes after two am when it was gone.I. remember it was a very cold winter night.I always no matter what time it is look in the sky since i was a kid. and i am sure the moon is never where i saw it that night.That is why i took notice and observed what i did. i was completely shocked and figured no one would believe this.I'm not absolutely sure of the day but absolutely sure of every thing else.I got up to use the lavatory.Before returning to bed i stopped to look through the window.That is when i saw what i saw.I know it was not a full moon so i can only speculate what it may have been.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked like a full moon too low and in a never seen before position.

content.detailedDescription: I was about five years old. my brother and i slept in the same room and same bed.  he was about four years old, now decesed.  we lived in a house, located almost on the edge of a ditch-bank, near a city called "lilbourn." the house was surrounded by cotton.  we were both playing in the bed.  it was near "daylight" outside.  my head started to itch in the top.  i had long hair. i scratched it.  upon scratching it, i felt my braid sticking up.  i reached up trying to smooth it down.  it would not go down.  i proceeded to move my hand up as high as i could get it.  i felt a hand that felt like a human's hand.  i was not afraid.  i asked my brother if my braid was sticking up and he said yes.  i asked him to pull it down.  he tried with no success.  in that moment, my mother came into the room turning on the light asking us why were we up so early.  i don't know why i didn't ask my mom if my braid was sticking up.  that was the end of it.  i have always told this story to my family and friends about the hand i felt, but could not see, and i have never heard anyone other than my mom saying she saw a pair of hands over her in the same house.  her story was different.  this isn't a ghost story either.  you are not suppose to feel a ghost.  i believe, in that same night, i saw the outline of a man's figure, dressed like "dick tracey," on the outside of my window.  was that an alien or a man using technology that is being covered up by the government?
content.summary: Alien

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking home from the store, i noticed a very large object above cloud level towards the east, against the clear blue sky. it may have been just above the altitude i usually see planes at when they start descending into the orlando airport. i see dozens of these planes go by every single day. 

this particular object seemed to be of either oval or cigar shape: it was too shinny or too far to tell. it looked like twice the size of a 747, but without wings.  at fist i thought it was an airplane, becuase its underbelly was silvery and reflective, but it was not moving at all! i could actually see one plane east of it at very high altitude above it headed north, and a another plane coming from the west amd apparently going to the orlando airport. the plane at higher altitude was sereral miles away and left the regular streaks of water vapor that planes usually leave as they move across the sky. 

my mind wondered what this could be, since it was obviously not a plane, and thought that it might be a meteor or a satelite, but it was not moving at all. then i thought it could be a star, but how could it be if this was in broad daylight? as i neared my home, i could still see it from the sidewalk. i kept looking up, and it very, very, slowly started to move straight upwards, making no sound at all, until it was too small to see anymore. 

from the moment i noticed it until it was gone, it must have been 20 minutes or so.

unfortunately, i did not have a camera. i wish i did.

did anyone else notice this? what could this have been?
content.summary: Jumbo-jet size silvery object with no wings which dissapeared straight upwards

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 13 years old. i was walking home from a friends house after dark, and i noticed 3 lights way off in the sky. i didn't think to much about it and kept going. but it was getting closer and i am trying to figure out what it could be. it must have spotted me because it came to me and stopped about 20 feet away about 15 feet up so i got a pretty good look at it. i couldn't see the shape of it because there were 3 lights on the front flashing on and off. rectangle shape on the lower front.Red, green,white. flashing one at a time. i was thinking what the hell is it? ufo never even crossed my mind, i haden't heard about ufo's much back then. it hovered right there for about 2 minutes. i didn't hear any engine noise just a humming sound. after about a minute the lights stopped flashing and came on solid. i was starting to wonder if i should run away. then the 3 flashing lights turned off and a spotlight came out of the left side bottom. all right i've had enough, the spotlight pointed at me and i ran like hell. there was a trailer park about 100 yards back so i ran in there and hid in the restroom. i waited about 20 minutes then snuck out to take a peek and it was gone. i ran and didn't stop until i was home.  thinking back now i still have not a clue what it was, helicopter? no there was no noise. planes don't hover. as far as i know it didn't chase me. i never said anything to anyone then, they would called me crazy. i  told my wife and some relatives about it a couple years ago. they said belive me but i know they didn't so here i am wondering what the hell it was and did i almost get abducted??


the main reason i am writing this is because i would like to know if anyone else has seen anything like it?  thanks, david williams
content.summary: Humming noise with lights,

content.detailedDescription: I was 14 years old and was staking out the foundation of a new home on some property my parents owned. it was my parents, my brother, and i. it was late in the day and although there was still sunlight in the western sky, my parents decided to call it a day. we loaded in our pickup truck to head back to our house. my parents were in the cab of the pickup and my brother and i were sitting on the tailgate which had been lowered for us to ride on. before my father started the pickup, i noticed first that there was a saucer across the road from us above the cave springs cemetery. this was only about 100 yards away. there was no sound whatsoever. it was the classic saucer. round with a dome on top and a row of lights and maybe windows around the rim. i shouted and pointed and we all sat and watched the saucer. it disappeared suddenly without a sound and reappeared much higher above the horizon in the north western sky. it remained there a couple of minutes, the disappeared again and reappeared in another part of the sky. we continued to watch this for about 15 minutes. then, the saucer disappeared never to be seen again. we are a very religious family, coming from a pentecostal background. this was quite a shock to us. i don't know if it was extraterrestrial or perhaps even demonic, but i do know there was something there. i saw it in daily light and close up.
content.summary: Classic saucer shape just yards away, disappeared and reappeared in different area many times

content.detailedDescription:
The event occured between 3 am and 4 am during a long distance yacht race across lake erie.  we were about 50 miles southeast of pt. pelee, canada. the evening sky was clear and i don't recall seeing a moon at the time of this sighting.  

i was on watch along with another individual at the time of this event.  seeing shooting stars are not uncommon this far from land and i would often search the sky looking for the telltale blazing comet-like tail of such a star.  this time, however, i saw what appeared to be a cluster of three blinking red and white lights.  i gave it little importance, thinking it was just an airplane at high altitude until it began to perform sharp, abrupt manuvers an airplane just cannot perform.  it would make instant, abrupt turns, moving in any direction with apparent equal ease.  the lights all moved in perfect unison, leading me to think they were all part of a single craft.  my watch mate also observed this same event, eventually asking me, "are you seeing this?"  once we both agreed that we were seeing the same thing, we put binoculars on the lights, but they were too high to discern any object shape. 

after about 45 to 50 minutes of this unusual flight pattern, the lights simply vanished in the night only to return about 1/2 hour later and again repeat its earlier manuvers high above us.

none of the other crew aboard the ship saw what the two of us saw that night.  we talk about freely, but we are not taken very seriously by anyone we tell this story to.  but i know what i saw was not a man made flying machine.
content.summary: Observed a trio of blinking lights which seemed to be moving in complete defiance to normal aircraft manuvers.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in our back yard with my daughter. on a perfect summer night. she began calling me and telling me that there was something in the sky. when i looked up to the sky i saw a large bright solid round orange object comming tord us. it was about as high up as a plane only bigger and round and it was a solid orange colar with what looked like red at the top. my daughter kept asking me what it was. i wish i had a answer for her but i didnt. it didnt make any sound at all as it flew over our house and over my yard. it seemed to be moving from west heading east. and in a straight line and a fast rate of speed. i stood up on my daughters play toys and watched it fly away. were really not sure what it was.. were wonderning if anyone else has reported this object.
content.summary: Large orange object flew over our house

content.detailedDescription:
I had moved into my apartment, but had not completed the assembly of my bed frame. my matress was on the floor against the wall that had a window. the night had become increasingly hot, so i had left the window open above my bed. after laying in my bed for about an hour; it was clear that the draft did not seem sufficent for my comfort, so i had decided to take off the window screen to get more air. i looked at my red digital clock that was sitting next to my t.V., it had read "1:4?"(i can not recall the exact minute but it was in the 40 range) it was a.M. when i fell asleep.
i remember waking up in what seemed like a incredibly lucid dream. but it appeared very real. so real in fact, that i could feel the grit and pebbles on the road that i had awaken upon in the middle of nowhere. 
i felt in a heavy daze, like a dreamy hangover of some sort. it was night and there was tall grass fields on either side of the road. the wind was blowing through the grass and the sky was clear with stars.  i looked in either direction of the road and it seemed to go for miles in either direction. there was no lights or signs of civilization on any part of the horizon. i recall having to lay back down because i couldn't hold myself back up.
    i woke again, this time in my bed, but my head was on the other end of the matress. my back was laying against the wall and i could see a shadow that was being cast from a tungsten light that was adjacent to my housing unit. the shadow was a humanoid figure with an oval/almond shaped head with narrow shoulders. my body locked frozen in a panic, understanding that whatever was at my window was right above me. i closed my eyes in fear trying to shake what i thought was a dream. i opened my eyes once again and its head was swaying from side to side. my breathing was in short labored breaths, i closed my eyes again wishing it would go away. i opened my eyes again and the shadow was gone. my digital clock was changing times as if in fragments. 3:46. 7:43. 11:54. 9:12 etc.(note: these are not the exact minutes that had been displayed from my clock) and i could hear from the an open window of my nieghbors answering machine, that it was playing in full volume in jarbled segments of voice. 
    i slowly lifted myself from my matress, and very carefully to the window and nothing appeared to be there, except a small red glowing orb (roughly the size of a ball bearing from the distance of approximatly 2 miles away to the west)that was gently lifting from the ground and rising competely vertical to the sky above,and eventually disappeared.
    the nieghbors answering machine had stopped and my clock read "4:17", i still felt slightly hazy, and had vomited sortly after. the two weeks following the event, i was experiencing unexplained nose bleeds and migraines. i had purchased a humidifier to help alleviate the problem of the bleeding but it continued to happen unexpectedly. the bleeding had stopped after that time, shortly after the migraines as well. what seem additionally odd about all of this is, i do not and did not have a history of migraines or nosebleeds.
content.summary: Possible abduction/unknown red-orb sighting (post-event)

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work. i got off the bus started to walk home and for some reason something was telling me to look up. as look up i notice something was hovering, in mid air, but i didn���t pay any mind to it. at first i thought it was plane, but it suddenly hit me that this object was hovering in mid air in a 45 degree angle in open area. i knew that it wasn���t an air plane because planes can���t hover in mid air and i knew it wasn���t a helicopter because the object was too big for it to be a helicopter. like i said, the object was hovering in a 45 degree angle for a minute or two and then it slowly started to straighten itself out. once it straightens itself out it began to proceed forward in a slow moving pace. i was actually blown away because i never expected to see something like this in my life. anyway, the object continued moving forward until it was gone.
content.summary: A strange object was hovering in mid air.

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday morning.  i always go for a pray'r walk at 6 30 a.M.
i live on 356 acres of land, a tad north of a central texas town.
in september, the eastern sky is only beginning to fade into a dark blue, over-all the sky was dark, stars easily pin-pointed.  
i could see orion, the moon was setting low in the western sky.
my dog accompanies on my pray'r walk.
my house sits about a half mile back on the property and there are no street lights or other houses.
i walk up the tree cover'd lane.
at the gate, i veer south.  i have huge power-line poles crossing the front of my property.  they almost serve as sentinel stands.

there is a well-worn dirt road that leads into a cascade of lakes, one upper that feeds into a lower lake.

as i turn'd onto the dirt road, i look'd up into the southeastern sky and a traveling object immediately caught my eye.  it look'd like venus was wandering across the sky.
i immediately knew it was not a plane.
it appear'd to be crescent in shape when observed closely, attempting to discern something that look'd like a plane.

on sunday morn, the world is quieter than normal.  no traffic noise, just morning sounds.  this morning was particularly quiet. i stopp'd and listen'd intently.  i tried to hear an airplane buzz.  none.  

the "wandering star" appear'd to be flying very low.  i knew it was not an airplane, no noise, no blinking lights.

it moved fast like the satelites my father had taught me to spot in the night sky as a child.  but it was so bright and seem'd to be in such close proximity to the earth.

i then just watch'd it.  it appear'd to have a slight bobble to it, almost as if it were wiggling back y forth, i expected it to back up any moment, it appear'd as if it were looking for something, not like it was on a fix'd course. for some reason the object gave the impression that it could fly in any direction without having to turn in a 360 arc.

it finally disappear'd into the southeastern sky.  as if it were suddenly hidden by an opaque veil.

i know the atmosphere can swallow up things in the sky in hazes.

i did not feel like i had witness'd anything eerie but i did recognize it was an object un-explain'd.  it didn't follow prescribed flying patterns.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Venus traveling

content.detailedDescription: Approximately around 8 pm i saw a bright light in the sky and at first i thought maybe was a plane, than i noticed it stopped moving for a view seconds and than start moving zigzag amazingly fast than went straight and disappeared in the sky. i never believed in ufo's, but after that night's experience my believes totally changed. who knows what is next...
content.summary: Bright light in sky moved zig zag and than disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying at my exgirlfriends cousins house in clinton, oklahoma.  we were visiting her family for the weekend.  it was 1:30 am and i was lying in bed, which was directly in front of the only open window in the room, it had no screen.  i saw what appeared to be a shooting star go from east to west.  it started slowing down, but never lost its brightness.  it came to a stop for just a second then proceeded southward.  at this point i knew it was not a shooting star.  as soon as it started moving south it curved back to the east and sped up to what appeared to be and infinite acceleration until it seemed to blur into a streek of light. 
i ran outside to see if there was any other activity, but saw nothing else.  her cousin awoke to me runnung outside.  i described to him what i saw and he told me he thought he was the only one who had seen it.  he said he had seen the same thing at least 5 times before.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a light move across the sky slow down, turn, then speed off.
